amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike section 430 on page 134, lines 17 through 25, relating to the Fe deral Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A073) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A073) Failed by voice vote.
